name: contact-sections-06
description: Centered contact with circular icon badges

files.content:
"use client" import { Mail, MapPin, Phone } from "lucide-react" const OPTIONS = [ { icon: MapPin, title: "Address", subTitle: "Find us at the office", description: "12124 First Street, nr 54", }, { icon: Mail, title: "Email", subTitle: "Send us your feedback", description: "hello@email.com", }, { icon: Phone, title: "Phone", subTitle: "Give us a ring", description: "+1 (424) 535-3523", }, ] export default function ContactSections06() { return (
Contact Us

Got a Question?

We'd like to talk more about what you need

{OPTIONS.map(({ icon: Icon, title, subTitle, description }, key) => (

{title}

{subTitle}

{description}

))}
) }

meta.container: w-full bg-surface min-h-svh flex px-4 py-12 items-center md:py-20 justify-center min-w-0
